text_1: We function as a print on demand webshop so please be aware that we don't have items in stock and have to print them first. But we are dedicated to delivering your customized products as soon as possible. Please find information on our shipping and delivery policies below.
text_2: All of our products are made to order, so please allow 2-7 business days for production before your order is shipped. Once shipped, domestic orders typically take 2-5 business days to arrive, while international orders may take up to 2-3 weeks. You will receive a shipping confirmation email with tracking information as soon as your order is on its way.
text_3: We offer delivery to addresses within members of EU. Shipping carrier depends on specific product and delivery is available Monday through Friday, excluding holidays.
text_4: Thank you for choosing our webshop. If you have any further questions about shipping and delivery, please don't hesitate to contact us.
